title: Azir's SandSoldiers Cannot AutoAttack teemo  shrooms.
body:
I was playing as Azir and after summoning his tower it revealed 2 of teemo's shrooms, so I sent a SS to take it out but my soldier just sat there autoattacking it over and over, If they can't do dmg to the shroom why can they target it?

Is it supposed to be like that? I think the soldiers should be able to attack them, not trigger them to blow up, but at least be able to damage/kill them given you have vision of the shroom..

replies.body: One does not simply touch satans possessions.
Mushrrooms don't go in the desert. To a humble soldier, they are a rare delicacy, a treat to only be seen, not touched, let alone tasted.

> [{quoted}](name=Narasimha,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=AuiOpRAd,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-03-11T04:54:12.831+0000)
>
> Mushrrooms don't go in the desert. To a humble soldier, they are a rare delicacy, a treat to only be seen, not touched, let alone tasted.

Dang it, you made me have to log in so I could tell you that this is the best comment I've ever read. Go have a cake, on me. {{item:2009}}
isn't it enough that he can clear normal wards with them when no other minionmancer can use their pets to clear wards and stuff?
Except not all pets completely replace autoattacks when in use?
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ 3 days old and no reply.. Thanks riot all I wanted was a simple answer. Whats the point in reporting..
I have never reported a bug before, but now I am dying to know if this is one or not.. {{item:3070}}

Would've been even more win had you said 

"Go...go now. Have a cake, on me"
